thread.title: Amanda C
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Amanda C

author: Amanda C
title: Amanda C
text: I was a bit skeptical as I had never purchased from them before, but once my books started to come in I was beyond happy with my decision to order. All of my books look brand new and in almost perfect condition. They all arrived within a week of me ordering. To anyone who loves to read and wants to expand their collection I highly recommend ordering from thriftbooks.com and I am playing my second order this week.
